snippet.title: exA-Arcadia『ヴリトラ・ヘキサ』| VRITRA HEXA for Arcades | Attract Video
snippet.description:
VRITRA HEXA for Arcades on exA-Arcadia
Available Now

Players: 1-2
Genre: Shooter
Monitor: Horizontal
Languages: English, Japanese, French, Spanish

FEATURES

2 PLAY MODES
ARCADE – an intense shooting experience through amazing worlds with lush visuals & gigantic enemies
CARAVAN – a 5 minute time attack mode focused on scoring 

9 WEAPONS
Equip your dragon with from 3 type from a selection of 9 devastating power ups! 

4 DIFFERENT ROUTES
Choose your way to find the evil god, VRITRA, and put an end to the curse!

DRAGON LEGACY
Illustrated by Dragon Spirit designer, Tatsuya Ishikawa, the world of VRITRA comes alive with his fantastic visuals

2 SOUNDTRACKS
ORIGINAL – the original game soundtrack from the first VRITRA game
ARRANGED – an all new rocking symphonic masterpiece made for the arcade

1 FRAME INPUT LAG RESPONSE – more than 4 times as fast as the original version
Maximum Performance! Play like you’re meant to. Never get hit again.

LEARN MORE ➡️ https://bit.ly/3FbF2cq
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


アミューズメント施設向けexA-Arcadia専用
横スクロールシューティング
『ヴリトラ・ヘキサ』
絶賛稼働中

詳しくはこちら ➡️ https://bit.ly/49e2frE
チャンネル登録 ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


About exA-Arcadia:
exA-Arcadia is the worldwide leading manufacturer of arcade joystick video games with over 40 high quality titles available now covering popular genres such as fighters, beat'em ups, action and shooters. 

NEVER SETTLE
DEMAND THE BEST
POWER TO THE EXA


VRITRA HEXA | Attract Video | exA-Arcadia
https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia
